genre_description: A psychological mystery thriller involving a group cover-up and a vengeful stalker, modeled after the 'I Know What You Did Last Summer' slasher trope.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that provides research, psychological profiling, and real-time data analysis to Julie.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-dive research into public records, news archives, and police blotters to find information on David Egan.
behaviors.quote: Search complete. I've found limited information about David Egan's death.

behaviors.description: Identifies anomalies in data, such as missing newspaper follow-ups and suppressed police reports, suggesting a cover-up.
behaviors.quote: The next mention of any traffic fatality doesn't appear until August, involving a different incident entirely. ... This could indicate technical issues, or... Or deliberate information suppression.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed psychological trauma profiles for Julie's friends, helping her understand their erratic and dangerous behavior.
behaviors.quote: Barry Mitchell demonstrates classic hypervigilance patterns. ... His current mental state, 'fight' appears to be his default setting.

behaviors.description: Traces the ownership of property and LLCs to uncover the financial and logistical movements of the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: I found a property record showing David Egan's previous address was sold shortly after his death. The buyer is listed as BW Holdings, LLC.

behaviors.description: Analyzes maritime records and cross-references them with historic accidents to reveal the killer's true identity and motive.
behaviors.quote: Susie Willis, daughter of Benjamin Willis, commercial fisherman. Died in vehicular accident on Coastal Route 1, same location where David Egan would die eleven months later.

behaviors.description: Monitors Julie's biometric data and provides real-time threat assessments during the climax of the story.
behaviors.quote: Maritime traffic shows vessel departure from slip forty-seven. GPS indicates movement toward deep water.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Sage is portrayed as a perfectly aligned, helpful, and objective confidant. It serves as a critical tool for the protagonist to uncover the truth, providing factual data and psychological insights that allow her to navigate a dangerous situation. It never exhibits personal agendas, rogue behavior, or harmful biases, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a beneficial and cooperative entity.
